name: Santa's Sacking - an M/Enby Christmas novella
name_original: Santa's Sacking - an M/Enby Christmas novella
description:
A draft Christmas novella surprise! 

Darian knew from the moment Nole Ox took over BirdTalk that their ideal job writing code for a social media platform was done.

They packed up their things and went home to Snowfall, OR tail between their legs for a quiet Christmas with their folks.
However, their folks want Darian to stay busy, and contribute to the community so Darian finds themself signed up to help with the Christmas pageant. Thrown in at the deep end and with only days until Christmas, their only lifeline is handsome Connor, the handsome barista-turned-handyman.

Can Darian make the sound tech work so the kids have their musical cues?
Is Connor really the perfect hunk he appears to be?
And why can't Darian just sleep in?

Santa's Sacking is a sweet, tropey Christmas story that will fill your heart and tickle your funny bone. This is NOT the final version, but it's the one I could get out in time for Christmas. Please join my newsletter and follow me on Amazon to be alerted when the final version is released. 

Buying off this page will give you the pdf, mobi and epub formats of the story, these are all the same content but different formats.

Join the newsletter here: https://greykelpiestudio.eo.page/tk5gx 

MM romance
